Become a skydiver

Banner Height 3/5

About the school

The Desert Campus Flight School ensures you can always learn something new or perfect your skills in a number of disciplines.

We are fortunate here at Skydive Dubai to have some of the most talented skydivers on the planet at our drop zones. Coaches and Load Organisers are available every day at both drop zones, covering a number of disciplines. Check with manifest on arrival to find out what’s happening on any given day.

The formation skydiving school offers all types of coaching from students wishing to achieve their A Licence up to advanced 4-Way and 8-Way. We offer 1-on-1 coaching as well as group coaching depending on experience and requirements.

Getting acquainted

Requirements to Skydive

1. No alcohol/drugs remove_circle_outline

2. Weight & BMI limit remove_circle_outline

Women

Weight 90.0 kg / 198.0 lbs or less
BMI Maximum 27.5


Men

Weight 100.0 kg / 220.5 lbs or less
BMI Maximum 30


Check your BMI online

3. Age 18 and above* remove_circle_outline

4. Medical conditions remove_circle_outline

5. Pregnancy remove_circle_outline

6. Waivers remove_circle_outline

Canopy piloting
